page.title: 07FOXHILL FARM
page.content: {FOXHILL FARM}IS 2\ KM AWAY FROM CHIPPENHAM . THE FARMER IS CALLED{MR {COPE}, HE IS A SHEEP FARMER . HE HAS 25 EWES , 25 LAMBS,3 RAMS,1 HORSE,1 DOG.MR COPE PLANTS HAY FOR HIS SHEEP IN THE WINTER . MR COPE'S FARM IS{5.0 {HECTARES}OF LAND.THE AVERAGE PRICE OF A SHEEP IS Â£60 AND A LAMB COST Â£40. HE SENDS HIS SHEEP TO CIRENCESTER. THE REASON HE DOESN'T GO TO CHIPPENHAM IS BECAUSE HIS SHEEP HAVE WHITE FACES AND THEY DON'T SELL AT CHIPPENHAM,SO HE HAS TO GO TO CIRENCESTER. HE WORKS 2 HOURS A DAY WITH NO WORKING HANDS, HE ONLY WORKS{2 HOURS}A DAY BECAUSE HE IS ALSO AN{ARCHITECT}. HE HAS BEEN A FARMER FOR 7 YRS,THROUGH THE YEARS HIS FARM HAS GOT BIGGER.
